#Text=Brazilian Vote Buying
#Text=parliamentary commission
#Text=present first joint preliminary report
#Text=Monday , September 5 , 2005
#Text=Brazil —
#Text=The Post Office and Vote Buying
#Text=parliamentary commissions of investigation unanimously approved on Thursday ( 1 ) their first joint preliminary report of activities .
#Text=The text was prepared by their redactors , Osmar Serraglio ( PMDB ) and Ibrahim Abi-Ackel ( PP ) , from Post Office and Vote Buying commissions respectively .

#Text=The deputies cited in the report are : Carlos Rodrigues ( PL - RJ ) , José Janene ( PP- PR ) , Pedro Correia ( PP- PE ) , Pedro Henry ( PP- MS ) , Sandro Mabel ( PL- GO ) , João Magno ( PT - MG ) , João Paulo Cunha ( PT- SP ) , José Borba ( PMDB-PR ) , Josias Gomes da Silva ( PT- BA ) , Paulo Rocha ( PT-BA ) , Professor Luizinho ( PT-SP ) , Romeu Queiroz ( PTB -MG ) , Vadão Gomes ( PP-SP ) , Vanderval Santos ( PL-SP ) , José Mentor ( PT-SP ) , Roberto Brant ( PFL -MG ) , José Dirceu ( PT-SP ) and Roberto Jefferson ( PTB-RJ ) .
#Text=The report indicts 18 Brazilian deputies and the former deputy Valdemar Costa Neto [ who resigned on August 1 ] .

#Text=They are accused of illegal campaign finance activities , of placing cronies in strategic positions in government enterprises and getting kickbacks from them , and of receiving cash payments in exchange for voting in line with the government in the Brazilian Congress .
#Text=The redactors called the allegation made by some parliamentarians that the resources were used to settle debts with electoral campaigns a " lame excuse " .

column1: #Text=According to them it is " perfectly plausible " that the loans taken by the businessman Marcos Valerio at the Banco Rural and the BMG for the ruling Workers ' Party ( PT ) were false and created to make the illegal funds seem legal .
#Text=In regards to the denunciations done by deputy Roberto Jefferson ( PTB )
#Text=the report says :
#Text=Everything which he said that could be investigated showed to be true , including confessions against himself .
#Text=Everything that must be compared to other testimonies showed a great degree of truth .
#Text=As a matter of fact , all of who , hurriedly , questioned him , saw their defenses collapse , before the successive discoveries .
#Text=According to the report , the businessman Marcos Valério is a not reliable person because of his contraditory testmonies .

#Text=The report says that several documents were identified and reviewed proving that large sums of money were withdrawn from agencies of the Rural Bank , in Brasilia and Belo Horizonte , as well as from bank accounts of the enterprises SMPB and DNA Propaganda .
#Text=According to the documents the beneficiaries were federal deputies who received the money in person or through relatives , advisers , or persons nominated by Marcos Valério .
#Text=The report affirms that it is possible that some payments were made on a monthly basis , and others more or less frequently .
#Text=Nevertheless , according to the report the periodicity of the payments is the less important fact .
#Text=External page
#Text=Post Office and Vote Buying
#Text=parliamentary commissions of investigation
#Text=first joint preliminary report ( in Portuguese )
